subject: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
PAYMENT AND TRANSFERS.
WIRE TRANSFER / AUDIT UNIT
DIRECTOR: DISCOVERY MANAGEMENT AND PAYMENT BUREAU.
Attn: Beneficiary ,
How Family?
The Investigation carried out recently proved to us that some Foreign
Beneficiaries had spent much money for TAXES REVENUES and
DOCUMENTATIONS without receiving their funds.
Truly, we have confirmed everything and are now ready to tackle this
matter to make sure that all Beneficiaries involved are paid their
funds without any further EXTORTION of funds like before. Now you are
seriously advised to stop all further communications with people
reaching you from various places to avoid confusion during and after
Your Payment is already processed by this Reconciliation Committee.
We are very sorry for what you went through in the past with Corrupt
Government Officials. Everything is now under control and your Overdue
fund shall be paid to you without further excuses. This is a promise.
Finally,fill as listed below and forward to this Reconciliation
Committee and expect further details from us. Waiting to hear
from you.
Your Full Name
Your Complete Address
Name of City of Residence:
Date of Birth (Day / Month / Year):
Mobile Number:
Occupation:
Company name:
Next of Kin:
Age:
Your International Passport:
Regards,
Thanks
Yours Truly,
George Martuns, head of the Team.

subject: Re:  DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
Dear George Martuns,

Thank you for your email. I am glad to hear that the matter of my overdue fund is being handled by your committee. Here are the details you requested:

Full Name: Lewis D. Noogie
Complete Address: 1234 Novosibirsk Street, Riga, Latvia
Date of Birth: 12th December 1975

I look forward to hearing from you soon with further details.

Best regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Maria

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
Dear  Mr  Lewis D. Noogie,
It  is  great p[easure  that  we  receive  your  message  which  has  taken
some months before  your response  and you are  very  lucky indeed  by
contacting us  before  the  deadline,  however  you  are  requested  to
forward  your complete  information as  stated  below to enable  us  begin
the  process  of  your transfer.

Your Full Name
Your Complete Address
Name of City of Residence:
Date of Birth (Day / Month / Year):
Mobile Number:
Occupation:
Company name:
Next of Kin:
Age:
Your International Passport:
Regards,
Thanks
Yours Truly,
George Martins, head of the Team.

ReplyForward
Add reaction

subject: Re: DIRECTORATE OF INTERNATIONAL
body:
Dear George Martins,

Thank you for your prompt response. I am indeed very lucky to have contacted you before the deadline. Here are my details as requested:

Full Name: Lewis D. Noogie
Complete Address: 1234 Novosibirsk Street, Riga, Latvia, LV-1001
Date of Birth: 12th December 1975

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best Regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Maria
